message: For docker geeks .. could you help me ??
story: Shady Atef shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Can I push application updates to docker image without rebuilding?
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: Let's say that I have docker image with web server, database server and web application in production. Can I push applications updates to the production container, without destroying the database ...

data.message: BMitch already answered you, you need to first make things into microservices, one container for DB and one for your web server. You also need to define volume on your web server so that you can externalize the application deployment. Hope that helps
